about_the_game: Smash and bash your way through the zombie mayhem while wearing these exclusively skinned X-Fists. Available from Emergency Shelter vendors (Story) and Vending Machines (Multiplayer), the X-Fists come ready-to-wear with an Exo Suit. Get ready to deliver a mighty thump.

name: Dead Rising 4 - X-Fists

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11-compatible sound card

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
